api_key_set_success.desc: 當 API Key 設定成功時顯示的訊息

api_key_verification_failed.text: API Key verification failed. Please check and try again.
api_key_verification_failed.desc: 當 API Key 驗證失敗時顯示的訊息

api_key_format_error.text: Please enter a valid API Key format (e.g., xai-xxxxxxx).
api_key_format_error.desc: 當 API Key 格式不正確時顯示的訊息。

trial_offer_desc.text: Congratulations! You’ve received a $25 gift card from xAI 🎁🎁🎁
trial_offer_desc.desc: 提供免費試用作為安慰的訊息。

xai_api_yt_video_guide.text: Watch the video to get your xAI API Key! {link}
xai_api_yt_video_guide.desc: 查看 xAI API Key 設定教學影片

trial_steps.text:
Follow the steps below to redeem your free Bilingrok language partner service:

1. Register for an xAI account
2. Generate an API Key
3. Copy and paste the API Key into the chat for verification

Once verified, enjoy a 7-day free trial of Bilingrok! 🎉🎉🎉
trial_steps.desc: 開始 7 天免費試用的步驟。

free_trial.text: Sign up for xAI to start your free trial.
free_trial.desc: 引導進入 xAI 網站註冊

choose_language.text: Choose your primary native language...(select below)
choose_language.desc: 提示用戶選擇他們的母語。

language_not_supported.text: Sorry, this language is not supported yet. Please try again!
language_not_supported.desc: 當選擇的語言不受支持時顯示的訊息。

confirm_native_language.text: Great! Your Bilingrok language partner also speaks some {language_name} 🤏.
confirm_native_language.desc: 確認用戶的母語的訊息。

native_language_value.text: Your language partner will help you create "notes" in {language_name} from your conversations. These notes will review, correct, and enhance vocabulary, phrases, or casual expressions!
native_language_value.desc: 解釋使用用戶母語的價值的訊息。

practice_language.text:
Which language do you want to practice? (select below)

Your language partner will use the chosen language to practice with you!
practice_language.desc: 提示用戶選擇他們想練習的語言。

confirm_target_language.desc: 確認用戶期望學習語言的訊息。

match_language_partner.text:
Your Bilingrok language partner will chat with you in {target_language_name} to provide the best language practice environment.

Even better, the system will periodically create notes in {native_language_name} from your conversations to help you improve! 🌟
match_language_partner.desc: 解釋訂閱的好處的訊息。

subscribe_offer.text: Choose your Bilingrok language partner subscription type...(select below)
subscribe_offer.desc: 提供用戶訂閱 Bilingrok 的優惠。

quick_reply_btn_xai-free.desc: 立即訂閱按鈕的另一個選項 - 領取試用的按鈕文字。

special_offer.text: This is a special offer just for you! We can’t wait to match you with a language partner! 🌟

unknown_command.text: Unknown command. Please check and try again.
unknown_command.desc: 當輸入未知命令時顯示的訊息。

flex_purchase_card_title.desc: Flex JSON 中購買卡片的顯示標題

flex_purchase_card_button_label.desc: Flex JSON 中購買卡片的按鈕名稱

flex_purchase_later_card_button_label.desc: Flex JSON 中稍後購買卡片的按鈕名稱

share_to_friend_guide.text: Long press 👆 the message above, click 'Share,' and quickly send $25 to your friends!
share_to_friend_guide.desc: 引導用戶長按推薦給朋友

Hey.desc: 用戶說 Hey，和用戶打招呼

topic_items.desc: Hey 後，讓用戶從裡面找話題
